edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.util
Class HardMacroGenerator

java.lang.Object
  edu.byu.ece.rapidSmith.util.HardMacroGenerator

public class HardMacroGenerator
extends java.lang.Object

This class reads an XDL design file and converts it to a hard macro. It will also create a VHDL wrapper to be able to instance the hard macro with the original interface of the design.

Author:
Chris Lavin Created on: Jan 27, 2010 Rewritten on: Jun 16 2010 by Jaren Lamprecht

Method Detail

convertToHardMacro

public Design convertToHardMacro(java.lang.String vhdName)
The main function which will convert XDL_Design design to a hard macro.

Parameters:
vhdName - The output file name, used to generate the VHDL wrapper file name.
Returns:
The newly created hard macro.

handleSHAPE

public void handleSHAPE()
This function removes the shape attributes from instances since adding several HMs to a design results with the duplicate shape names.

handleIOLOGIC

public void handleIOLOGIC()
This function is questionable in its necessity as ILOGIC and OLOGIC primitives could be part of a hard macro. We are assuming that they were not intentional.

isTriState

public boolean isTriState(Instance instance)
Returns true if the given IOB is a tri-state buffer

Parameters:
instance -
Returns:
True if tri-state
